es.moiseslodeiro.ibri

Class ibriActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.moiseslodeiro.ibri.ibriActivity

  • public class ibriActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    The ibriActivity is the first executed class in the application. It loads the XML template and applies the main configuration to work with our HTTP server.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Mois√©s Lodeiro Santiago
    See Also:
    AppCompatActivity, LocationListener
